name: BDSM VR
description:
Experience graphic, realistic S&M play, and live out your dirtiest desires in a space where no one can see or hurt you. This girl is yours and yours alone, so feel free to love, hold, and tease her to your heart's content...

Instructions:
Touching the red cube allows you to switch between situations.
Touching the blue cube allows you to change your girl's clothes, or make her nude.
6DoF is fully supported. Feel free to move around the room as you see fit.

Features:
The player can pick up items, and use them to hit or tease their girl.
Footage from the video camera is displayed on the monitor, and the camera can be moved freely.
Vivid moans, cries, and sound effects add new layers of enjoyment.
